q1_general_response: {"answer": "Based on the image alone, the differential diagnosis should include: 1) Melanoma, 2) Atypical nevus (dysplastic nevus), 3) Seborrheic keratosis, 4) Pigmented basal cell carcinoma, and 5) Dermatofibroma."}
q2_dataset_response: {"answer": "Based on the image, characteristics that might indicate malignancy include: Asymmetry, irregular borders, uneven color distribution, and a diameter greater than 6mm."}
